model_answer: The most direct leading events would be A and C as they both mention the need for warmth and the use of heaters which aligns with the statement made by the camper in event 9. Option B does not mention the usage of heaters, and option D only mentions the location of the speaker and does not reference any previous events regarding heating arrangements.

The most plausible causes of her preference to cook outside the tent are events A (poor indoor ventilation due to cold, lack of windows, and need to keep things warm) and B (propane stove and kitchen appliances pose hazards when used indoors). Option C (functional outdoor kitchen area) seems less likely because it only mentions setting up a hand-washing station and does not specifically address cooking arrangements. Option D (campsite lighting) is also less likely because it only mentions the general setup of lights in the forest without any reference to cooking preferences.
